trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows status bar control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle de barra de status do Windows.

trans-unit.source: StatusStrip replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: StatusStrip substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Special features of StatusStrip include a custom table layout, support for the form's sizing and moving grips, and support for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property, which allows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to fill available space automatically.
trans-unit.target: Recursos especiais de StatusStrip incluem um layout de tabela personalizados, o suporte para o formulário do dimensionamento e familiarizar-se de mover e suporte para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>propriedade, que permite um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>para preencher o espaço disponível automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os itens a seguir foram especificamente projetados para funcionar perfeitamente com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>em todas as orientações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the StatusStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> A StatusStrip control displays information about an object being viewed on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: Eles estão disponíveis por padrão em tempo de design para o controle StatusStrip:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>controle StatusStrip A exibe informações sobre um objeto que está sendo visualizado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, componentes do objeto ou as informações contextuais relacionadas à operação do objeto dentro de seu aplicativo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a StatusStrip control consists of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objects, each of which displays text, an icon, or both.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um controle StatusStrip consiste <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>objetos, cada um deles exibe o texto, um ícone ou ambos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>

trans-unit.source: The StatusStrip can also contain <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: Também pode conter StatusStrip <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>

trans-unit.source: The default StatusStrip has no panels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão StatusStrip não tem nenhum painéis.

trans-unit.source: To add panels to a StatusStrip, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or use the [StatusStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1) at design time to add, remove, or reorder items and modify properties.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar painéis a um StatusStrip, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método ou use o [Editor de coleção de itens StatusStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1) em tempo de design para adicionar, remover, ou reordenar os itens e modificar propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the [StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c) at design time to run common commands.
trans-unit.target: Use o [caixa de diálogo de tarefas StatusStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c) em tempo de design para executar comandos comuns.

trans-unit.source: Although StatusStrip replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora StatusStrip substitui e estende o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro, se você escolher.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> supports overflow functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> supports overflow functionality; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o método CreateAccessibilityInstance, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> with the specified text, image, and event handler on a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um padrão <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> com o manipulador de eventos, a imagem e texto especificado em um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Use the CreateDefaultItem method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> with commonly used characteristics to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método CreateDefaultItem para adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>com características usadas para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>

trans-unit.source: The text to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser usado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the `text` parameter is a hyphen (-), this method creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o `text` parâmetro é um hífen (-), esse método cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para exibir o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que gera a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> eventos quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Image%2CSystem.EventHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>, or a if the text parameter is a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Image%2CSystem.EventHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>, ou um se o text parâmetro é um hífen (-).

trans-unit.source: Gets which borders of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> are docked to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as bordas do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> são encaixadas o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the left, right, top, and bottom edges of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> from the edges of the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento, em pixels, entre a esquerda, direita, superior e bordas inferior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> as bordas do formulário.

trans-unit.source: Use the DefaultPadding property to set the interior space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DefaultPadding para definir o espaçamento interior entre controles.

trans-unit.source: When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle é um contêiner de itens, o preenchimento representa o espaço da borda do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: The default is `{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é `{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as dicas de ferramenta serão mostradas para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> por padrão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> when it is first created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho, em pixels, do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> quando ele é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> constructor representing the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> construtor que representa o tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o que <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> bordas são encaixados para seu controle pai e determina como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> é redimensionado com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Dock para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, definindo o encaixe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>para alinhar-se com as bordas esquerdas do controle pai e são redimensionados à medida que o controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: Controles são encaixados em sua ordem Z, que é a camada visual de controles em um formulário ao longo eixo z do formulário (profundidade).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode ser ancorado a uma borda de seu contêiner pai, ou pode ser encaixado para todas as bordas e preencher o contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visibility of the grip used to reposition the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a visibilidade da alça usada para reposicionar o controle.

trans-unit.source: Even with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property set to `true` and the GripStyle property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>propriedade definida como `true` e a propriedade GripStyle definida como `Visible`, a alça de dimensionamento não será exibida a menos que você defina também a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>propriedade para um dos valores de overflow.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, não será exibida a alça de dimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> lays out the items collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> estabelece a coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: Use the LayoutStyle property to get or set how items are arranged on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade LayoutStyle para obter ou definir como os itens são organizados em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Pinta o plano de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPaintBackground também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> para pintar.

trans-unit.source: Provides custom table layout for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o layout de tabela personalizados para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Override OnSpringTableLayoutCore to do custom table layouts.
trans-unit.target: Substitua OnSpringTableLayoutCore para fazer os layouts de tabela personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a coleção de exibidos e itens de estouro após um layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as dicas de ferramenta serão mostradas para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowItemToolTips property to get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> display behavior.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ShowItemToolTips para obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>Exibir comportamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as dicas de ferramentas são exibidas para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the boundaries of the sizing handle (grip) for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites da alça de dimensionamento (alça) para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the grip boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites da alça.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing handle (grip) is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma alça de dimensionamento (alça) é exibida no canto inferior direito do controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use the SizingGrip property to display a grip to provide an indication to the user of when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is resizable.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a propriedade SizingGrip para exibir uma alça para fornecer uma indicação para o usuário quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>é redimensionável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: Even with the SizingGrip property set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo com a propriedade SizingGrip definida como `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A>propriedade definida como `Visible`, a alça de dimensionamento não será exibida a menos que você defina também a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>propriedade para um dos valores de overflow.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, não será exibida a alça de dimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a grip is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for exibida uma alça; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> stretches from end to end in its container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> estende de ponta a ponta de seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> stretches from end to end in its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> expande de ponta a ponta em seu <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure wraps messages that Windows sends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>estrutura encapsula as mensagens que o Windows envia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa estrutura envolver uma mensagem e atribuí-lo para o procedimento de janela deve ser distribuída.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar essa estrutura para obter informações sobre uma mensagem de que o sistema envia para seu aplicativo ou controles.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure directly.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>estrutura diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>estrutura, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: To make creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures more efficient, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure uses its pool of existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures instead of creating an instance of a new one, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar a criação <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>estruturas mais eficientes, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>estrutura usa seu pool de existentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>estruturas em vez de criar uma instância de um novo, se possível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: However, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure is not available in the pool, a new instance of the structure is created.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>estrutura não está disponível no pool, uma nova instância da estrutura é criada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
